personalInfo.name: Mayur Mahajan
personalInfo.title: Python Full-Stack Developer | Android Developer | Web Development Lead
personalInfo.about: And passionate Python Full-Stack Developer and Android Developer specializing in building scalable, user-focused applications. With expertise in React.js, Firebase, REST APIs, and MongoDB, I have delivered 4+ production-ready projects spanning Android apps, web platforms, and automated backend systems. I thrive in Agile environments, leading teams to boost delivery efficiency by 40%. Currently pursuing a B.E. in AI & ML with a CGPA of 9.05/10, I am committed to driving innovation through clean code, modern design principles, and problem-solving that delivers measurable impact.

education.degree: Bachelor of Engineering in Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning
education.institution: P.E.S. Modern College of Engineering, Pune

experience.title: Web Developer Intern
points: Developed Edu-Score MCQ Platform using Django, SQL, and Bootstrap for 500+ student assessments.
Automated scoring, leaderboard ranking, and question sheet management, reducing manual workload by 75%.
Engineered a fully functional WordPress Job Board using the Superio theme with plugin customization.
Performed front-end optimization, backend CRUD operations, and API-based data handling.

projects.title: Code RAG — Local AI Code Assistant
projects.description: A local AI-powered RAG-based code assistant built with Django, Ollama, and deepseek-coder. It scans your project files, generates embeddings, and provides context-aware code explanations, debugging help, and project insights. Includes project indexing, chat sessions, auto-sync, WebSockets, and a ChatGPT-style UI — all running locally without cloud dependencies.

projects.title: Edu-Score — Django MCQ Evaluation Platform
projects.description: A full-stack Django-based MCQ testing platform enabling tutors to create quizzes and students to attempt them without login. Includes automatic scoring, real-time leaderboard, AJAX submissions, and personalized tutor dashboards.

projects.title: Job Board Website — WordPress Superio Theme
projects.description: A customized job portal built using WordPress and the Superio Job Board theme. Includes tailored dashboards, custom listings, plugin extensions, domain setup, and improved UI/UX for job seekers and employers.

projects.title: Weather App — Django OpenWeatherMap
projects.description: A Django web app that shows real-time weather data using the OpenWeatherMap API.

projects.title: QR Code Generator — Flask App
projects.description: A Flask-based QR code generator with preview, PNG download, and share functionality.

projects.title: TwitterProject — Django CRUD App
projects.description: A simple Django CRUD web app with authentication and media uploads.

projects.title: Virtual Mouse using Hand Gestures (macOS Compatible)
projects.description: Control your mouse with hand gestures using your laptop camera.

projects.title: Simon Game
projects.description: Classic Simon memory game with color and sound sequences.

projects.title: QR-Firebase-Attendance — Admin App
projects.description: Android app for managing attendance through QR codes.

projects.title: Find the Number
projects.description: Guess a hidden number between 1 and 100 within 10 chances.

projects.title: Word Game — Play Store
projects.description: Android word puzzle game published on Play Store.

projects.title: TodoApp
projects.description: To-do list Android app with real-time Firebase sync.

projects.title: QR-Firebase-Attendance — Student App
projects.description: Collect student details, upload profile images, and generate QR codes from Firebase UIDs.
